problem_text:
Do there exist simple finitely generated right-orderable groups?
There exist finitely generated right-orderable groups coinciding with the derived subgroup (G. M. Bergman).
V. M. Kopytov, N. Ya. Medvedev
answer: Yes, such groups do exist (J. Hyde, Y. Lodha, Invent. Math., 218 (2019), 83–112).
